entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
